items.headline: Gold hit a record and silver’s at a 14-year high — this Wall Street bank says two other commodities will join the party
items.summary_en: Gold and silver prices were soaring on Monday. Citigroup strategists see the bull market continuing, with two other commodities poised to surge next.

items.headline: Brain drain? How Wall Street is reacting to $100,000 charge for H1-B visas
items.summary_en: New Trump administration rules that will require a $100,000 fee for a type of visa used extensively in the technology industry brought fears of an exodus of talent that will sap the potential for growth.

items.headline: U.S. stock futures dip after Friday’s record highs, even as ‘the market has learned to thrive in ambiguity’
items.summary_en: U.S. stock-market futures were little changed on Sunday, after the three major indexes all closed at record highs on Friday.

items.headline: Why the bull market for stocks may now hinge on the 10-year Treasury yield

items.headline: Social Security is on track to be insolvent in less than 10 years — but its commissioner says there’s ‘plenty of time’ to find a solution
items.summary_en: The Old-Age and Survivors Insurance fund is expected to run out of money by 2033 at the latest, recent reports show.
